cvrfdoc.DocumentTitle: Red Hat Security Advisory: idm:DL1 security update

DocumentNotes.Note:
An update for the idm:DL1 module is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.2 Extended Update Support.
Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Moderate. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.

Red Hat Identity Management (IdM) is a centralized authentication, identity management, and authorization solution for both traditional and cloud-based enterprise environments.
Security Fix(es):
* samba: Samba AD DC did not always rely on the SID and PAC in Kerberos tickets (CVE-2020-25719)
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
